typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as double '000,000,000.00',
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['TOU*.csv']) ~> TOUSource
TOUSource aggregate(groupBy(DateTime,
		MeterCode,
		DataType),
	MedianValue = round(mean(Energy))
,
		MaximumValue = round(max({Energy})),
		MinimumValue = round(min({Energy}))) ~> TOUAggregate
